scripts.build: docker build -t tecnodesign/studio:latest -t tecnodesign/studio:v1.3 git@github.com:capile/studio.git && docker push tecnodesign/studio:latest && docker push tecnodesign/studio:v1.3
scripts.test: docker run -it --rm -e STUDIO_ENV=test -v $PWD:/var/www/studio -u $UID tecnodesign/studio:latest composer test
